data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Le Canonnier have now been confirmed.
Christof Dierick starts the match. Mouscron with the kick-off in Mouscron.
In the minute 16, Mouscron's Marko Bakic has been booked in Mouscron.
Ibrahima Sory Sankhon (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marko Bakic scores to make it 1-0 at Stade Le Canonnier.
In the minute 34, At Stade Le Canonnier, Herve Koffi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Pol Garcia (St. Truidense) has received a first yellow card.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. St. Truidense kick-off.
Wolke Janssens is replacing Ibrahima Sory Sankhon for the away team.
Deni Hocko is on a sub for Marko Bakic for Mouscron.
In the minute 53, Goal! Nuno Da Costa extends Mouscron's lead to 2-0.
The home team replace Nuno Da Costa with Serge Tabekou.
Duckens Nazon is replacing Chris Durkin for St. Truidense at Stade Le Canonnier.
In the minute 62, St. Truidense have been given a penalty...
Goal! Yuma Suzuki nets a penalty for St. Truidense. They now trail 2-1.
Kevin Muscat (St. Truidense) is making a third substitution, with Keito Nakamura replacing Facundo Colidio.
In the minute 79, Mouscron make their third substitution with Imad Faraj replacing Harlem Gnohere.
Mouscron take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Imad Faraj.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Keito Nakamura pulls one back to make it 3-2.
Wolke Janssens is booked for the away team.
Bruno Xadas (Mouscron) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
